frozen_definition.name: PosturePal
frozen_definition.signal_source: Posture app reviews cite 'very sensitive default settings' causing 'false alerts for eating', users want solutions that are 'less annoying'
frozen_definition.description: Smart posture coaching that uses gentle vibration reminders only when actually slouching, avoiding false alerts from normal movement
frozen_definition.target_user: Office workers with back/neck pain who find existing posture apps too intrusive or inaccurate
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: 69% of office workers have back pain, existing apps trigger false alerts for normal activities like eating
core_loop: Receive gentle vibration when slouching detected
frozen_definition.differentiation: Advanced movement filtering to avoid false alerts, focus on encouragement vs. punishment
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes posture analytics, personalized exercise routines, and integration with health apps

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic reminders, premium for analytics and personalized coaching
